Package com.gemalto.idp.mobile.otp

Interface TokenManager.TokenCreationCallback

Enclosing interface:
TokenManager
public static interface TokenManager.TokenCreationCallback
This interface can be used by the application, when they call createToken() method.
Since:
5.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onError(IdpException exception)
    This callback function is called, if any exception happen during the token creation.
    void
    onSuccess(Token token, Map<String,String> tokenExtensions)
    This callback function is called when the token created successfully.

  • Method Details

    • onSuccess

      void onSuccess(Token token, Map<String,String> tokenExtensions)
      This callback function is called when the token created successfully.
      Parameters:
      token - the Token.
      tokenExtensions - contains the collection of the token extensions.

    • onError

      void onError(IdpException exception)
      This callback function is called, if any exception happen during the token creation.
      Parameters:
      exception - this is generic exception, you can directly catch this exception or catch each specific exception below.
      IdpStorageException, when database operation failed.
      DeviceFingerprintException, when the fingerprint generated at runtime does not match the expected fingerprint.
      PasswordManagerException, when the TOKEN domain is not logged in (using one of the password managers).
      IdpNetworkException, when network operation fails.
      IdpProvisioningException, only for PPv5 when the server returns error status on response.
